attributes.action: Make the newly passed car drivers go through the same restrictions as motorcyclist
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: just an idear to put a restriction on newly passed car drivers the same as motorcyclist ie you can only drive a small cc car when first passed your test then after a year you would be able to drive a larger cc car just like the bike test now it would stop all young driver deaths
